ygData.subject: Tripred ship
ygData.msgSnippet: Tyrael could not believe what Magnus had said. He would have many questions for Blackheart. He opened a commline to Rodimus. Tyrael: Rodimus, our alliance

Tyrael could not believe what Magnus had said. He would have many 
questions for Blackheart.

He opened a commline to Rodimus.

Tyrael: Rodimus, our alliance still takes place. Considering these new 
facts, I fear it will end with this battle. I promise though that I 
will not attack your group until my ship is down again. It is an honor 
to fight on your side. Tyrael out.

He directed the laser battery on Hydras. Just as he went to push the 
firing command, a tremor shook the ship. Damage status showed that an 
aft propulsor had been hit.

Tyrael: What in the Matrix was that?

Meteara flew over the mountain range and saw the ship. She prepared 
her huge pincer and charged it. She unleashed a massive electric 
discharge at it.

The discharge burned up two of the laser batteries.

Tyrael: We are under attack! Any assistance will be accepted!
